data.text: @nosportsforyou Hi LC, thanks for your reply. Please know that as a low cost carrier we cannot offer all available flights as an alternative for delayed flights. Hope you’ll enjoy your upcoming flight with us. Regards - Lee

@nosportsforyou Hi LC, thanks for your tweet regarding your flight from Da Nang. I can see that the flight is now scheduled to depart at 4:25 PM today. Please know that you can always check the status of your flight here - https://t.co/bippLEBaNS. Hope this helps. Thanks - Lee

@rickymamby Hi Rico, thanks for the tweet. I’m sorry to hear that you haven’t received your itinerary for your upcoming Jetstar flight. If you could DM us your booking reference, full name, and flight details so we can take a look at how we can assist further. Regards - Joie
@khoa_p Hi Khoa, I'm sorry to hear about your experience paying for your flight. Could you please provide more details via DM along with your booking reference and full name? Thanks- M
@dillidikudii Hi there, I’ve responded to your Tweet in our Jetstar Airways page. –M

[SG] Go wet and wild on thrilling water slides and rides at the newly opened, world famous Atlantis resort in Sanya! Fly from just S$59 one way all-in!  https://t.co/XMwmwbou99 https://t.co/wPuBiAUypY

[SG] The super fun Atlantis resort has opened in Sanya, and we were to check it out! You can now fly there from just S$59 one way all-in, don't miss out! https://t.co/XMwmwbou99 https://t.co/wPuBiAUypY

@yasminzrh Hi there, you may add baggage on our Manage Booking page here https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr. Alternatively, you may also reach our Contact Centre for assistance to add baggage. Please see here https://t.co/WyaikGh6hE. Thanks- M
@xuanjunwong Hi Xuan, could you please provide more details regarding your query or concern, via DM? We'd be happy to see how we can assist. Thanks- M

@KellyOngMas 2/2 I can also confirm that you may only bring your selfie stick on your checked baggage because this may present a security risk on board. Please visit https://t.co/AoukzG82xX. Thanks- M

urls.title: Travelling to Australia - DAFF
urls.description: Alerts Help protect Australia by following biosecurity requirements when travelling or returning to Australia from FMD risk countries.

data.text: @KellyOngMas 1/2 Hi Kelly, we welcome bringing your own food on board. For international, depending on the food, it may be subject to quarantine. Please visit https://t.co/Nuvak4j4VZ.

@Helmysuxx Hi there. thanks for replying. Depending on your purchased ticket, changing your flight may mean that you need ton pay for applicable fees such as change fee and fare difference. Please see this link for more information https://t.co/BhNfmgGjJK. Thanks - Josh
@aarcal Hi Aaron, I've tweeted my response again here. Thanks- M

data.text: @aarcal Hi Aaron, I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight last Friday night. It’s always important for us to get every flight away on time and we also don’t want delays however, it is sometimes unavoidable to delay a flight due to operational and safety reasons. Thanks- M
@Helmysuxx Hi there, you may wish to reschedule your flight via Manage Booking page here https://t.co/xweA4PnaBr or you may wish wish to contact us here https://t.co/rZ0F7Snfv0. Thanks- M

data.text: @codipapo Hi Cody,  I'm sorry to hear about your delayed flight from Manila to Narita.  It’s always important for us to get every flight away on time and we also don’t want delays however, it is sometimes unavoidable to delay a flight due to operational and safety reasons. Thanks- M
@aarcal Hi Aaron, I've responded to your other tweet. Thanks- M
@omgzel 2/2 This means that customers will not be able to book Jetstar on unsupported browsers anymore. You might want to update your browser or clear your browser cache and cookies. Thanks- M
@omgzel 1/2 Hi, there is no current reported issue on our website. However, we are upgrading our browser security standard.
@hong24585 Hi Hong, thanks for your tweet. Could you please confirm your booking reference and full name via DM, so we can check this for you? Thanks- M

@niccijsmith Thanks for keeping in touch. At Jetstar safety is our highest priority and our most important promise to our customers, so I'm glad to see that we're able to assist you on this occasion. Cheer! - Jerry :)

data.text: @markladson 1/2 I'm sorry to hear about the available check in counter for your flight. Please be aware that Jetstar is a tenant of the airport and that as such we have limited control over the facilities of the airport. 2/2

@KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for the tweet. You may appreciate to know that if online check-in is available for your international flight, check-in opens two days before your flight and closes two hours before your flight departs. Regards, Joie
@arthleen Hi Arthleen, thanks for the tweet. I have responded to your DM. Regards – Joie
@dvdty 2/2 So we can assist you further, kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Regards, Joie

@dvdty 1/2 Hi David, I'm sorry to hear you weren't happy with the way our staff handled the situation. You have every right to look forward to prompt and courteous service whenever you contact us and I sincerely apologise if the service you received didn’t meet your expectations.

data.text: @dvdty Hi David, thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear about the cancellation on your flight from Osaka. If you could DM us your booking reference and full name so we can take a look at how we can assist you further. Thanks - Lee

@DatuAKO Hi Robin, thanks for your tweet. As of this writing 3K765, departing from Singapore –Manila is still scheduled to depart at 5:25 PM. It may also help to know that you can keep an eye on the status of your flight here - https://t.co/bippLEBaNS.  Thanks - Lee

data.text: @vivvaghela07 Hi there. i'm sorry to hear if your flight fro today was delayed. Could you provide us your booking reference number and Full name via DM so we can check this further? Thanks - Hazel

@anthonyctan Thanks for getting in touch. I've checked this for you and I can confirm that flight 3K 762 from Manila to Singapore tomorrow is still operating as normal and is schedule to fly until further notice. Alternatively, you can check your flight status here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP - J

@_Matthew_Lucas_ Hi there, I’m sorry to hear about this. You may appreciate to know that we value your feedback so we can further improve our services to you and other passengers in the future. Regards, Joie

@_Matthew_Lucas_ Hi there, I’m very sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. As advised, kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check how we can assist you further. Regards, Joie

@raoulesperas Hi there, thanks for the tweet. You may appreciate to know that the situation with the aircraft or airport can change suddenly or unexpectedly, and there’s always a huge amount of sorting out to be done behind the scenes. Regards, Joie

data.text: @raoulesperas Thanks for your reply. Please be aware that Jetstar is obligated to respect the privacy of our customers. Unfortunately, this means that I cannot disclose personal information to anybody besides the travelling passenger, booking contact or a person authorised by them. Thanks - J

@raoulesperas 2/2 Despite all the efforts we make, it is sometimes unavoidable that we have to cancel a flight on the day you’re due to travel. I apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Thanks - Jerry
@raoulesperas 1/2 I'm sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. We certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights.
@qiuullery Thanks for your reply. Rest assured that when situation like this occur, our airport staff will try to do their best to assist affected passengers. Thanks - Jerry
@qiuullery 2/2 and are required to communicate with other teams throughout the airport while meeting very strict timelines. I'm sorry for any difficulties this may have caused you. Thanks - Jerry

@qiuullery 1/2 Thanks for your reply. I’m sorry to hear about how frustrating this is for your mum and I’m sorry that our staff weren’t able to provide the level of assistance you were expecting. But please know that our airport staff are balancing a number of important responsibilities
@wrcox Hi William, thanks for your reply. If you could DM us your booking reference, full name, and flight details so we can check your booking further. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks - Lee

@monariamm Hi Monica, thanks for the tweet and sorry to hear about this. In order to keep our fares low we don’t provide complimentary food and beverages. Rest assured we value your feedback and we’ll use it so we can continue to improve. Thanks - Lee
@DwinTheTan 2/2 that we're always going to put safety first. Rest assured that we value your feedback and we’ll use it so we can continue to improve. Thanks - Lee

@DwinTheTan 1/2 Hello Dwin, thanks for getting back to us. If our crew are fatigued, they cannot safely operate a flight.  As such, our crew only have a certain number of hours they can work before they must have time off to rest. I hope you'll appreciate

@DwinTheTan Hi Dwin, thanks for the tweet and sorry to hear about this. In order to keep our fares low we don’t provide complimentary food and blankets. However, I recommend you to speak with one of our Airport staff so they can assist you further. Thanks - Lee

@_mmeyma Hi there, thanks for your tweet. In this instance, you would need to be checked in 2 hours before 1:05 AM. You can also see further details regarding check-in time here - https://t.co/ttppLrgAY3. Thanks - Lee
@monariamm 2/2 I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you. Thanks - Josh

@monariamm 1/2 Thanks for replying Monica and I'm sorry to hear about the cancellation of your flight last night. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards.

data.text: @wrcox Hi William, thanks for your tweet. I can see that flight 3K764 has been delayed and will now depart Osaka at 9:10 PM. I recommend you to keep an eye on your flight here https://t.co/bippLEBaNS. Thanks - Lee
@_Matthew_Lucas_ 3/3 So I can check this for you, please send us a DM with your complete name and booking reference number so we’ll see how we can assist. Thanks - Josh

@_Matthew_Lucas_ 2/3 We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you.

@_Matthew_Lucas_ 1/3 Hi there. Thanks for replying and I'm sorry to hear about this. Please be aware that Jetstar is a tenant of the airport and that as such we have limited control over the facilities such as shuttle bus transfer from the aircraft to terminal building.

@_Matthew_Lucas_ Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I have checked this for you and as of this writing, I can confirm that flight 3K 764, Manila to Singapore new estimated departure is 8:50pm. You may wish to check the flight status of the flight here: https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP. Regards, Joie

@monariamm Hi Mona, thanks for your tweet. So we can check this for you, could you please DM your booking reference and full name? You may also check your flight updates here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP. Thanks- M

@MommyModeOn Hi there, I've checked this for you and as of this writing, flight 3k 766 from Manila to Singapore will still depart as planned at 9:45 PM and will arrive at 1:20 AM. For updates, please visit https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP. Thanks-M

@pinkstaaar_ Hi there, thanks for the tweet. You may wish to inquire flight details through DM or via Live Chat here: https://t.co/A6Soi6jsN6 or through our Telephone Reservation team on 1800 1611 0280. Regards, Joie

@febryprast_ Thanks for keeping in touch. I'd like to advise that we don't recommend you to post your personal details including your booking reference publicly. You may want to delete your tweet and send us a DM so we could check this further for you. Thanks - Jerry

@DivyaJags Hi, sorry to hear about your damaged bag. We always do our best to take care of each piece of luggage and return them in the condition we received them. Apologies if this wasn't the case for you. Could you please DM your booking reference and full name, so we can check? Thanks- M
@KellyOngMas Hi Kelly, thanks for your tweet. That is fine as long as you have the correct phone number, email address on your booking and information on your passport. Thanks- Maye

@febryprast_ Thanks for your reply. If you purchase a baggage on your origin, you will carry the baggage allowance up until your destination. You don't have to pay for your baggage on during your transit. I hope this helps. Thanks - Jerry

@febryprast_ Thanks for getting in touch. If you have a pre-purchased baggage you don't have to pay for your baggage on during your transit unless you were charged for excess baggage as outlined here https://t.co/G75IYmOFIH. Thanks - Jerry
@KeLpin_ Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I'm afraid that tripod camera is not allowed on board as it can present a security risk. Please visit https://t.co/AoukzG82xX. Thanks- Maye
@IndVoter2016 I'm sorry to hear about this. So we could check this for you, please DM us your booking reference along with your full name. We'll see how we can assists. Thanks - Jerry

@xyrael Thanks for your tweet Nat and I'm sorry that you weren't able to travel on your flight due to your passport's validity. So I can check this for you, please send us a DM with your complete name and booking reference number and we'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Josh
@yoitsark 2/2 You may also check this link to get a real-time information about flight timings https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. Thanks - Josh

data.text: @malou_sa Sorry to hear this Malou. As you may appreciate, we outlined in our itinerary that Jetstar Asia flights check-in counters will open 2 hours before departure. If your flight is at 6:10 PM, check-in will open at 4:10 PM Penang time. –M
@DennisBrouwer5 Hi Dennis, I’m a llitle unsure of this. If you could DM us more information and your booking reference, so we can check on how we can further assist. Regards, Joie

@DennisBrouwer5 Hi Dennis, You may appreciate to know that prices aren’t static – they are subject to availability and can change. Usually, as ticket prices sell and the plane fills up, the price of the flight will increase. Also, fares can change as we manage the performance of each flight. - J
@cylarez 2/2 If you could DM us your booking reference so we can check on how we can assist you further. Regards, Joie

@cylarez 1/2 Hi Sylvain, Thanks for the tweet. I’m sorry to hear that you’re having difficulties in receiving your itinerary.  As of this writing, there are no current website outages, I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a difference browser.

@LeslieCBarry Hi Leslie, It’s always important for us to get every flight away on time and we also don’t want delays however, it is sometimes unavoidable to delay a flight due to operational and safety reasons. I sincerely apologise for your experience. Thanks- Maye
@anna_garces I'm sorry to hear about this. Could you provide us your booking reference number along with your full name via DM so we can look into this for you? Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @puchaaby 2/2 Boarding pass is also required you can print it via email or PDF. You can also print it at one of our kiosks at the airport if available. Please visit https://t.co/YDI4Bs7CIw. Thanks- Maye
@puchaaby 1/2 Hi there, I can confirm that you can go straight to the gate if your flight is departing from Jakarta to Singapore. Please visit https://t.co/J8YehMmXu0 and https://t.co/aKG4zWnzFE.

@leftover_craic We also advise you not to post private information (such as booking reference) publicly for confidentiality and security purposes. You may wish to delete this Tweet and provide us your booking reference via DM so I can check this further and see how I can assist. –M 2/2

@leftover_craic Sorry to hear about your cancelled flight Andrew. We certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights. Despite all the efforts we make, it is sometimes unavoidable that we have to cancel a flight. 1/2
@Orsomucca Hi Marco, sorry to hear this. I have confirmed that 3K 202 was delayed due to engineering requirements. I'm really sorry for any inconvenience caused. -J

data.text: @linkanletlora Sorry to hear this. I have confirmed that Jetstar flight 3K 202 was delayed due to engineering requirements. I'm really sorry for any inconvenience caused. -J

@vatsabhishek 2/2 which can sometimes lead to cancellations down the track to our scheduled flights.  Please be assured that we will reach you once your flight is affected by delay or cancellation. Thanks- Maye
@vatsabhishek 1/2 Hi Abhishek, We are always monitoring all of our flights if it is safe to travel or not. At Jetstar safety is our highest priority We will not fly unless it is safe to do so,

@Orsomucca Hi Marco, I've checked this for you and can confirm that flight 3K 202 from Jakarta to Singapore will still continue to depart to the original flight times as planned. Please keep an eye here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP for flight status updates. Thanks- Maye
@vatsabhishek 2/2  options for your affected flight. Keep an eye here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP for your flight updates. Please be assured that safety is always our number one priority. Thanks- Maye

@vatsabhishek 1/2 Hi Abhishek, a lot of things can happen on the day and circumstances beyond our control is unpredictable. If in any case your flight will be affected by uncontrollable circumstances we'll keep you updated and reach you to the contact details on your booking and provide
@vjsingh11 2/2 and provide options for your affected flight. Keep an eye here https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP for you flight updates. Thanks- Maye

@vjsingh11 1/2 Hi VJ, a lot of things can happen on the day and circumstances beyond our control is unpredictable. If in any case your flight will be affected of uncontrollable circumstances we'll keep you updated and reach you to the contact details on your booking

@ginzyxx Hi. You can make changes to your flights but as I've mentioned, fare rules will apply. Please see here for your reference: https://t.co/yOyN1UpbXS Thanks - H
